user.description: Select your Account Type. Most users will need to select Google Account. Field Test is only available for selected testers in the Google Field Test program.

account_link.description: Unfortunately, Google does not provide an official API for this integration. To get it working, you will need to manually retrieve your issue_token and cookies by following the instructions in the integration README (https://github.com/iMicknl/ha-nest-protect/tree/#retrieving-issue_token-and-cookies). Please paste them below.
